S

sendToAllServers(Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sends a packet to all external connections.
sendToAllServersExcept(String, Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sends a packet to all external connections except one (if it is one of this object's external connections).
sendToClient(String, Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sends a packet to a specific client that is connected to the internal server by ip.
sendToClient(Client, Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
 
sendToClients(Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sends a packet to ALL clients connected to the internal server.
sendToClientsExcept(String, Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sends a packet to all connected clients except one.
sendToServer(String, Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sends a packet to a server if there is a connection to it.
sendToServer(Client, Packet) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
 
setClientDisconnectAction(NetAction) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sets an action to be run when an external server disconnects
setServerConnectAction(NetAction) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sets an action to be run when a client connects to the internal server.
setServerDisconnectAction(NetAction) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Sets an action to be run when a client disconnects from the internal server.
shortenFromFront(byte[], int) - Static method in class networkObjects.ByteOps
Removes the numBytes from the beginning of an array, returns a new list with the remaining data.
slice(byte[], int...) - Static method in class networkObjects.ByteOps
The slices list is an arbitrarily long list of lengths.
startServer() - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Stops the server if it is running, then starts a new one on the preset server port.
startServer(int) - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Changes the server port and starts the server on that port.
stopServer() - Method in class networkObjects.NetworkIO
Stops the server and clears all client data.
